dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT sref1.shipment_refnum_value bl_number, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(s.sail_date,'dd-mm-rr'),'fmMonth DD, YYYY') booking_date, (CASE WHEN sref2.shipment_refnum_value IS NULL THEN s.shipment_xid ELSE sref2.shipment_refnum_value END) shipment_number FROM shipment s LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref1 ON s.shipment_gid = sref1.shipment_gid AND sref1.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.BILL OF LADING NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref2 ON s.shipment_gid = sref2.shipment_gid AND sref2.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.INVOICE NUMBER' WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND :P_RUN = 'FINAL' UNION SELECT NVL(sref1.shipment_refnum_value,'Data Missing in System') bl_number, NVL(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(s.sail_date,'dd-mm-rr'),'fmMonth DD, YYYY'),'Data Missing in System') booking_date, (CASE WHEN sref2.shipment_refnum_value IS NULL THEN s.shipment_xid ELSE sref2.shipment_refnum_value END) shipment_number FROM shipment s LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref1 ON s.shipment_gid = sref1.shipment_gid AND sref1.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.BILL OF LADING NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref2 ON s.shipment_gid = sref2.shipment_gid AND sref2.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.INVOICE NUMBER' WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND :P_RUN = 'DRAFT'

SELECT DISTINCT (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN obrem1.remark_text ELSE NVL(obrem1.remark_text, 'Data Missing in System') END) drafts_at, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN obrem2.remark_text ELSE NVL(obrem2.remark_text, 'Data Missing in System') END) credit_number, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN obrem3.remark_text ELSE NVL(obrem3.remark_text, 'Data Missing in System') END) credit_date, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN obrem4.remark_text ELSE NVL(obrem4.remark_text, 'Data Missing in System') END) opening_bank, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN obrem5.remark_text ELSE NVL(obrem5.remark_text, 'Data Missing in System') END) opening_bank_address, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN obrem6.remark_text ELSE NVL(obrem6.remark_text, 'Data Missing in System') END) drawee, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN obrem7.remark_text ELSE NVL(obrem7.remark_text, 'Data Missing in System') END) drawee_address FROM shipment s LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON ssul.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_remark obrem1 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrem1.order_base_gid AND obrem1.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_PAYTERM_DRAFTS AT' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_remark obrem2 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrem2.order_base_gid AND obrem2.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_PAYTERM_LETTER OF CREDIT NUM' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_remark obrem3 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrem3.order_base_gid AND obrem3.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_PAYTERM_LETTER OF CREDIT DATE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_remark obrem4 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrem4.order_base_gid AND obrem4.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_PAYTERM_OPENING BANK' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_remark obrem5 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrem5.order_base_gid AND obrem5.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_PAYTERM_OPENING BANK ADD' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_remark obrem6 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrem6.order_base_gid AND obrem6.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_PAYTERM_DRAWEE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_remark obrem7 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrem7.order_base_gid AND obrem7.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_PAYTERM_DRAWEE ADD' WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND NOT sessuj.s_equipment_gid IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT 'Data Missing in System' drafts_at, 'Data Missing in System' credit_number, 'Data Missing in System' credit_date, 'Data Missing in System' opening_bank, 'Data Missing in System' opening_bank_address, 'Data Missing in System' drawee, 'Data Missing in System' drawee_address FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT s.shipment_gid FROM shipment s LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON ssul.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND NOT sessuj.s_equipment_gid IS NULL)

SELECT TRIM(TO_CHAR(b.total_cost,'999,999,990.00')) total_numonly, UPPER(CASE WHEN --NOTE - TO GET NUMBER TO WORDS, MUST BE FORMATTED AS A DATE - AND THE MAX JULIAN DATE IS 5373484. THIS SHOULD NOT BE AN ISSUE - MAX SHIPMENT IS IN THE $1 MILLION RANGE. FLOOR(b.total_cost) > 0 AND FLOOR(b.total_cost) <= 5373484 THEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(FLOOR(b.total_cost), 'j'), 'jsp') ELSE CASE WHEN FLOOR(b.total_cost) > 5373484 THEN 'ERROR - UNABLE TO CALCULATE' ELSE 'ZERO' END END ) || ' AND ' || COALESCE(TRIM(TO_CHAR((b.total_cost * 100) - (FLOOR(b.total_cost) * 100),'00')),'00') || '/100' total_text FROM (SELECT ROUND(SUM(net_wt_mt) * (CASE WHEN obr.remark_text IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE TO_NUMBER(obr.remark_text) END) - (CASE WHEN suat.total_adjustment_amount IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE suat.total_adjustment_amount END),2) total_cost FROM (SELECT sstopd.shipment_gid, SUM(ROUND(ssu.unit_net_weight_base / 2204.5855379,3)) gross_wt_mt, (SUM(ROUND(ssu.unit_net_weight_base / 2204.5855379,3)) * (CASE WHEN ssur.refnum_value IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE TO_NUMBER(ssur.refnum_value) / 100 END)) dockage_mt, ROUND(SUM(ROUND(ssu.unit_net_weight_base / 2204.5855379,3)) - (SUM(ROUND(ssu.unit_net_weight_base / 2204.5855379,3)) * (CASE WHEN ssur.refnum_value IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE TO_NUMBER(ssur.refnum_value) / 100 END)),3) net_wt_mt FROM shipment_stop_d sstopd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_ACT PRODUCT SPEC_DOCKAGE_MAX' WHERE sstopd.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 GROUP BY sstopd.shipment_gid, ssur.refnum_value) a INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON a.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON ssul.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid AND NOT oob.order_base_gid IS NULL LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_remark obr ON oob.order_base_gid = obr.order_base_gid AND obr.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_PAYTERM_PRICE' LEFT OUTER JOIN VIEW_SHIP_UNIT_ADJUST_TOTAL suat ON ssej.shipment_gid = suat.shipment_gid GROUP BY obr.remark_text, suat.total_adjustment_amount) b
